name: 楊宗銘
objective:
1. DC to DC converter
(a) Buck converter, Boost converter, Buck-Boost converter
(b) Series-load resonant dc-dc converter, Parallel-load resonant dc-dc converter
(c) Zero-current-switching converter, Zero-voltage-switching converter
(d) Switching Power Supply: Flyback converter and Forward converter
(e) Control of Switching-mode dc Power Supply
2. AC to DC converter
(a) Line-frequency phase-controlled rectifier
(b) Single-phase converter (phase-controlled rectifier)
(c) Three-phase converter (phase-controlled rectifier)
(d) High-voltage dc transmission system using multi-pulse converter
3. DC to AC converter
(a) H-bridge inverter
(b) Three-phase inverter
(c) Pulse-width-modulation strategies
(d) Static var compensator system using three-phase inverter
(e) Thyristor-controlled inductors
(f)Thyristor-controlled capacitors
(g) Interconnection of renewable energy sources: Photovoltaic array interconnection, Wind turbine interconnection
schedule:
第一週  Buck converter, Boost converter, Buck-Boost converter
第二週  Series-load resonant dc-dc converter, Parallel-load resonant dc-dc converter
第三週  Zero-current-switching converter, Zero-voltage-switching converter
第四週  Switching Power Supply: Flyback converter and Forward converter
第五週  Control of Switching-mode dc Power Supply
第六週  (a) Line-frequency phase-controlled rectifier
(b) Single-phase converter (phase-controlled rectifier)
第七週  Three-phase converter (phase-controlled rectifier)
第八週  High-voltage dc transmission system using multi-pulse converter (I)
第九週  High-voltage dc transmission system using multi-pulse converter (II)
第十週  (a) H-bridge inverter (b) Three-phase inverter
第十一週  Pulse-width-modulation strategies
第十二週  Static var compensator system using three-phase inverter(I)
第十三週  Static var compensator system using three-phase inverter(II)
第十四週Thyristor-controlled capacitors, Thyristor-controlled capacitors
第十五週  Interconnection of renewable energy sources: Photovoltaic array interconnection
第十六週  Interconnection of renewable energy sources: Wind turbine interconnection
scorePolicy: 作業 30%   期中考30%   期末考40%
materials: Mohan, Undeland, Robbin, ” Power Elecronics,” 3rd Ed. John Wiley and Sons, Inc., New York, 2003.
